definitions.title: adv.
definitions.body: (contracted fr. I. [[אַיִן]]) where? or whither? 1Sa 10:14 (cf. 1Sa 27:10 SyrVer Targum, v. sub [[אַל]] ad fin.); only besides in † [[מֵאָן]] whence? 2Ki 5:25 Kt (Qr [[מֵאַיִן]]); † [[עַד־אָן]] of time to what point ? how long? Job 8:2. With [[ה]] locale: [[אָנׇה]] (a) whither ? Ge 16:8, Ge 32:18, 2Sa 2:1, 2Sa 13:13, 2Ki 6:6, Is 10:3, Ps 139:7, Ps 139:7 + 9 t.; in indirect sentence Jos 2:5, Ne 2:16; (b) = where ? † Ru 2:19 (c) in the phrase [[אָ֫נֶהּ וָאָ֫נׇה]] any whither † 1Ki 2:36, 1Ki 2:42, 2Ki 5:25; (d) of time, [[עַד־אָנׇה]] how long? † Ex 16:28, Nu 14:11, Nu 14:11 (c. [[לאׁ]]) Jos 18:3, Je 47:6 (sq. [[לאׁ]]) Hb Hab 1:2, Ps 13:2, Ps 13:2, Ps 13:3, Ps 13:3, Ps 62:4, Job 18:2, Job 19:2 (less common than the syn. [[עַדּ מָתַי]]).
